import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Certificate Settings for Prisma Cloud Compute</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v33.00/settings/certs"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"manageDefenders"}
```



Returns the Subject Alternative Name(s) (SANs) in Console's certificate.
Defenders use these names to connect to Console.

## cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL request that uses basic auth to retrieve the SANs in Console's cert:

```bash
curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X GET \
  "https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/settings/certs"
```


<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

CertSettings are the certificates settings

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"caExpiration"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"CAExpiration holds the expiration date of the CA cert.\n","format":"date-time","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"consoleSAN"} required={false} schemaName={"string (string)[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ConsoleSAN if specified, use this list as the SAN for the console server certificate. Used for websocket and API.\n","items":{"type":"string","title":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"defenderOldCAExpiration"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"DefenderOldCAExpiration holds the expiration time of the defender old CA cert.\n","format":"date-time","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"caExpiration\": \"2024-07-29T15:51:28.071Z\",\n  \"consoleSAN\": [\n    \"string\"\n  ],\n  \"defenderOldCAExpiration\": \"2024-07-29T15:51:28.071Z\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"default"} value={"default"}><div></div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
